name: Beary Your Dead
description:
All Beary Bear wanted was to hibernate in his comfy cemetery home. Unfortunately, the zombear apocalypse has made that difficult. Help Beary return the barbearic zombears to their eternal rest, so he can finally get some shut-eye...

This is a game I made about two and a half years ago for a game jam about bears. Haven't really posted it anywhere since, so I figured I'd post it here. There are a few differences here than the Jam version (mainly the addition of a dash and a re-balancing of drops) but the majority of the game is the same.

Controls (because I didn't have time to put in a control page...)
Arrow Keys/WASD: Move
Z: Attack
X: Dodge
Spacebar: Jump
